description: The Heritages of Modern Greeks A lecture by Prof. Peter Mackridge delivered at the British Academy as part of the series of lectures organized for the 125th anniversary of the British School at Athens, "Living Hellenism: Triptych of Lectures." (Thursday, 20 October 2011)

title: The Heritages of Modern Greeks
